org.apache.accumulo.proxy

Class ProxyServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.proxy.ProxyServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccumuloProxy.Iface

    public class ProxyServer
extends Object
implements AccumuloProxy.Iface
    Proxy Server exposing the Accumulo API via Thrift..
    Since:
    1.5
